entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet.exe silently ignores global.json with a two digit sdk version #37602
  • ISerializable documentation claims it works with XmlSerializer #37601
  • IsPublishable with PublishSingleFile, PublishAot etc. copies unnecessary .pdb to PublishDir #37585

PullRequests

Updated

  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
